mapper.select: select t.*, sd.name serviceDepartName, f.name facName, s.value facStatusTypeValue, ct.value checkTypeValue, sqt.value questionTypeValue, sqn.value questionNatureValue, rs.value reformStatusTypeValue from security_fac t left join unit_service_depart sd on t.service_id = sd.id left join unit_fac f on t.fac_id = f.id left join config_fac_status s on t.fac_status_id = s.id left join config_security_check_type ct on t.check_type_id = ct.id left join config_fac_security_question_type sqt on t.question_type_id = sqt.id left join config_fac_security_question_nature sqn on t.question_nature_id = sqn.id left join config_security_reform_status rs on t.reform_status_id = rs.id where t.id = #{id}
